Description: Glazed composition bottle in form of cucumber; modelled with evenly spaced inlaid vertical strips of blue glaze down body; surface worn but probably originally light blue glaze; fine, pale bluish-grey core; worn at mouth, end and one side.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Enkomi
Bibliographic references: Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (P38, Fig 66)
